bibl.title: Philoponus and the Coptic Eucharist.
bibl.note: Creation. - Heavenly beings. - Rulers. - A documentary echo. - Conclusion. "John Philoponus was composing his learned works as aids to the self-fashioning of Egypt’s newborn Miaphysite church, which needed educated clergy, educated faith- ful, and the tools for producing both."
bibl.seg: MacCOULL L.S.B., Philoponus and the Coptic Eucharist.

Creation. - Heavenly beings. - Rulers. - A documentary echo. - Conclusion. "John Philoponus was composing his learned works as aids to the self-fashioning of Egypt’s newborn Miaphysite church, which needed educated clergy, educated faith- ful, and the tools for producing both."
